name: No more control
description:
A short game about the journey of a dog who hates control.

r - reset

space - continue walking

arrow keys - change direction

assets used from

https://outspacer.itch.io/platformer-sfx

https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack

https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-1bit-topdown
